name: Tip Tap Rewind
description:
Tip Tap Rewind is mobile game .

the Game play is press/touch the obstacles and Rewind them to Boss , If the obstacles touch the Barrier ,He will lose some HP and the obstacle will back to Boss and damaging him .The Game Play Start Slowly and getting Faster  .

Player can use only  two'2' Finger in same time, there is no drag , no hold .
